content.query:
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 00: Usar la BD Creada
-----------------------------------------------
USE updatalakehousebanco;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01: Creacion de tabla de dimension Data
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * 
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/lakehouse/m_party_agencia/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.m_party_agencia ()
 AS (
SELECT * 
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/lakehouse/m_party_agencia/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
)

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01.1: Prueba de Creacion
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * from business_knowa.bi_agencia_dim

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02: Creacion de vista de tabla
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE VIEW business_knowa.v_agencia_dim AS
SELECT 
ID_AGENCIA,AGENCIA,DEPARTAMENTO,PROVINCIA,DISTRITO,fechaCarga,is_active,hash_unique
FROM OPENROWSET (
 BULK '/business/business_knowa/bi_agencia_dim/*.parquet',
 DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
 FORMAT ='PARQUET'
) as [r];

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03: Validar creaci√≥n de vista
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * FROM business_knowa.v_agencia_dim
